snippet: Relatives and friends gathered to grieve over the death of Ruhshona Kurbonova, who was described by one of those on hand as her family’s brightest treasure.
abstract: Family and friends gather in Brooklyn to mourn Ruhshona Kurbonova, 2-year-old girl who drowned in Prospect Lake, after wandering away from a family picnic.
lead_paragraph: Relatives and friends gathered to grieve over the death of Ruhshona Kurbonova, who was described by one of those on hand as her family’s brightest treasure.

headline.main: Day After Drowning at Park, Brooklyn Girl, 2, Is Mourned
headline.print_headline: Day After Drowning at Park, Brooklyn Girl, 2, Is Mourned
